Package Algorithms

Class NewtonRaphson

java.lang.Object
Algorithms.NewtonRaphson
public class NewtonRaphson extends Object
The NewtonRaphson class is a Java class that uses the Newton-Raphson method to find the optimal value of a certain parameter within a given range, using a tolerance value as the stopping criterion.
